fluid_specs.specification: ACEA A5/B5 (Volvo VCC RBS0-2AE/SAE 0W20 for extreme conditions)
fluid_specs.notes: Lower oil grades may not offer the same fuel economy, engine performance or engine protection. Do not use oil additives.

fluid_specs.notes: Under normal driving conditions, the transmission fluid will not need to be changed during the transmission's service life.

fluid_specs.notes: Contains ethylene glycol. Do not mix different types of coolant. Only use new coolant when replacing larger components.
fluid_specs.variant_notes: Hybrid battery has its own expansion tank

fluid_specs.notes: Capacity for vehicles with headlight washing.

maintenance_schedule.service_description: Rotate tires (front to rear, rear to front) to prevent differences in tread depth and wear patterns.
maintenance_schedule.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual

maintenance_schedule.service_description: Subsequent tire rotation performed every 6200 miles (10,000 km).
maintenance_schedule.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual

maintenance_schedule.service_description: The temporary spare should be replaced at 6-year intervals, even if it has never been used.
maintenance_schedule.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual

tire_specs.tpms_relearn_procedure: Store the new inflation pressure in the Car Status app and drive the vehicle at speeds over 22 mph (35 km/h) until the system detects the new values.
tire_specs.rotation_pattern: Front to rear / Rear to front
tire_specs.notes: Same values apply to 235/55 R19 and 255/45 R20 sizes.
tire_specs.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual

tire_specs.tpms_relearn_procedure: Store the new inflation pressure in the Car Status app and drive the vehicle at speeds over 22 mph (35 km/h) until the system detects the new values.
tire_specs.rotation_pattern: Front to rear / Rear to front
tire_specs.notes: Same values apply to 265/35 R22 size.
tire_specs.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual

tire_specs.notes: Temporary spare tire. Do not exceed 50 mph (80 km/h).
tire_specs.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual

torque_specs.procedure_notes: Tighten in a crisscross pattern. Equivalent to 103 ft. lbs. Check torque after a wheel change.
torque_specs.model: Xc60 T8 2020 Xc60 T8 Owner's Manual
